RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU BET A FORTUNE away alertly set the pace holding daylight to upper stretch widening under hand urging late. SOMESUGARNSPICE chased willingly to upper stretch proving a clear second best there. GIACOMO CASANOVA gave inside pursuit finishing evenly along the rail. BABY DOG breaking slowly lost ground to upper stretch moving up six wide. Y'ZIN UP raced evenly lacking more. FIERY SIDE played no factor. DEVILS WAR CRY was always outrun. THE GROOM'S JUL was never involved. WELCOMETOTHESSHOW dropped back early trailing throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Giacomo Casanova
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pursuit, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Welcometothesshow
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early

ENTRY.NAME: The Groom's Jul
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: You Bet a Fortune
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, held daylight to lane, widened under hand urging

ENTRY.NAME: Fiery Side
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Somesugarnspice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Dog
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, wide lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Devils War Cry
ENTRY.OWNER: Fevata Cody Fevata Christine and Fevata Trevor
ENTRY.COMMENT: laways outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Y'zin Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P and Navy Chief's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED DEVOLUTION sent clear edged away on lead moving to a commanding margin in upper stretch having plenty left there. LUVTHEONEURWITH slow early came five wide in upper stretch rallying from mid track saving place. UNBRIDLED VICTOR chased the pace to upper stretch being dispatched by the winner there hanging late. BIKO hustled on the outside pursued to upper stretch weakening there. CIRCLE INDY raced evenly lacking more. CHOCO ROCO played no factor. ROLL ME OVER chased on the turn tiring in upper stretch. RECKLESS AFFAIR was always outrun. STRONG ATTITUDE showed early speed then faded along the inside. I RUN was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, faded inside

ENTRY.NAME: Choco Roco
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Victor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, no match lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Luvtheoneurwith
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 5 wide into lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: I Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Biko
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled outside, pursued to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Devolution
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, drew off on lead, in command lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Roll Me Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased on turn, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Circle Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOFIA STRONG pressed clear into upper stretch digging in from the four path holding sway to wire. BRODY'S JESSICA a step slow through the turn rallied from mid track down the lane saving place. THE REIGN SONG gave a steady advance on the inside through the turn angling four wide in upper stretch finishing evenly. GIRO KATE raced evenly throughout lacking more. PALACE MAGIC faded on the turn. MAMALONA sent clear was hooked on the turn giving way in upper stretch. LITTLE LUCERITO trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Little Lucerito
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: The Reign Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained inside through turn, angled 4 wide lane, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Giro Kate
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Mamalona
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, hooked on turn, gave way top lane

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's Jessica
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, rallied mid track lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed clear into lane, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since November 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAYS CASTLE gave a prompted middle move pressing on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch drawing away late. OPTIMIZME went evenly circling out to upper stretch rallying late six wide. MEAN ELENITA slow early saved ground to upper stretch passing a few there from the inside. DONNA LIRICA stalked the pace pressing to the lead on the far turn being overpowered in upper stretch weakening late. HIGH FASHION LADY tracked the pace chasing on the far turn flattening out in upper stretch. LIPARI played no factor. LIL SWEETHEART set the early pace giving way on the far turn. ISLAND BEAUTY folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Elenita
ENTRY.OWNER: Tijuana Racing Stables and Cuadra Cruz Diablo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly to lane, passed some on inside

ENTRY.NAME: Optimizme
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, circled out to lane, rallied 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Bays Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, pressed far turn, shook clear lane, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Lipari
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Donna Lirica
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed to lead far turn, ceded top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Sweetheart
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: High Fashion Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, chased far turn, flattened out lane

ENTRY.NAME: Island Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimatin g Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENECA ROCKS trailed early swinging out to upper stretch coming with a wide rush arriving in time. VINEGAR VEGGIES went evenly through the turn surging to the lead in upper stretch edging clear being run down in the last strides. HOV LANE chased the pace steadying briefly when in close between horses near the eighth pole continuing on with an even finish. WHATCHAMACALL set the pace being hooked in upper stretch weakening on the inside of rivals. CHICA CHULA bobbled leaving the gate, raced evenly throughout. FIRST IMPRESSION faded on the turn. KARMA GHIA played no factor. ROLO BOLO showed early speed then faded on the turn. CASTLE REVIEW gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: First Impression
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Karma Ghia
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Vinegar Veggies
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, surged to lead upper stretch, run down late

ENTRY.NAME: Rolo Bolo
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, faded turn

ENTRY.NAME: Seneca Rocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, swung out to lane, wide rush, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Castle Review
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Whatchamacall
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked lane, dueled, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Hov Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, in close brief steady between 1/8 pole, even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Chica Chula
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled break, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since Novem ber 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME SUNDAY gained on the turn racing widest down the lane surging up in the closing yards. AMAAZA sent clear set the pace digging in down the lane being hooked between horses late ceding to outside pressure. IN TO THE NIGHT slow early saved ground to upper stretch rallying gamely along the rail. ACCOLADES GALORE chased the pace to upper stretch vying from mid track being right there in the closing yards. CONTENT slow early played no factor. FLAT DISCOUNT weakened on the turn. BLEST LIFE raced second flight tiring to upper stretch. BIG AMBITION was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked between late, ceded

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ambition
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Content
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Discount
ENTRY.COMMENT: weakened on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 5 wide lane, right there mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Sunday
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up on turn, wide upper stretch, surged up late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Amy E. Dunne & Ciaran G. Dunne

ENTRY.NAME: In to the Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, saved ground, rallied gamely on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, tired,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Novemb er 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIKEABLE sent clear set the pace widening into upper stretch holding safe to wire. HIGH ROLLING DUDE tracked the pace emerging in upper stretch chasing the winner home in game fashion. DOWNTOWN CONNECTOR slow early lagged to upper stretch giving a mild rally to improve along the rail. CONRAD THE RED stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch weakening the final eighth. DIXIE DRAWL slow early played no factor. MANSFIELD TIGER raced evenly wearing down on the far turn. APPRAISAL played no factor. BASTIEN LE BROWN was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved up on rail

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, emerged top lane, finished well

ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, widened top lane, held safe

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Appraisal
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Mansfield Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, wore down

ENTRY.NAME: Bastien Le Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NINETIES COUNTRY slow early circled out advancing on the turn surging to the lead in upper stretch drawing out late. BANKX TURBO pressed the pace dueling to upper stretch being overpowered late saving place. CATFISH pressed three deep on the turn then weakened near mid track the final eighth. BEACH HOLIDAY slow early swung eight wide in upper stretch passing tired ines. MOGALU raced evenly playing no factor. ROLL DEM BONES faded on the turn. CALL ME LATER pressed hard through the turn wilting in upper stretch. AS DE ORO COCO had brief speed then gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung 8 wide lane, passed a few

ENTRY.NAME: As de Oro Coco
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Nineties Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled out turn, surged clear driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Roll Dem Bones
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Later
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mogalu
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Bankx Turbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, overpowered, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Catfish
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep turn, weakened mid track
